12 Jun 2013 - Mohammed Lakkadshaw

While working on my app Android app Ken, I needed to render HTML in Android, I was very much delighted when I found out that android's TextView supports HTML rendering and it can be easily achived by converting html into Spannable using Html.fromHtml(<html_Content) method and sending it to TextView's setText method. TextView myTxt = (TextView)findViewById(R.id.textView);...
